treatment.name: cypress_omnibus
treatment.desc: Cypress testing everything possible in one go.

gameStages.name: Test displays earlier submission by position
Test displays earlier submission of current player

prompt_multipleChoiceIntroExample.name: multipleChoiceIntroExample
prompt_multipleChoiceIntroExample.author: James Houghton
prompt_multipleChoiceIntroExample.prompt:
# Markdown or HTML?

We need to decide whether to use Markdown or HTML for storing
[deliberation](https://www.annualreviews.org/doi/abs/10.1146/annurev.polisci.11.081306.070308) topics.

- **Markdown** files are a convenient way to include basic formatting in a human-readable plain text document that can be easily version controlled.
- **HTML** documents allow for more customization, but are more difficult to write and to read without a renderer.

_Which format is better for this task?_

![questionImage](shared/question.png)

prompt_multipleChoiceWizardsIntroExample.name: multipleChoiceWizardsIntroExample
prompt_multipleChoiceWizardsIntroExample.author: James Houghton
prompt_multipleChoiceWizardsIntroExample.prompt: # Which of the following wizards appears in the most novels?

prompt_introOpenResponse.name: introOpenResponse
prompt_introOpenResponse.author: James Houghton
prompt_introOpenResponse.prompt:
# Markdown or HTML?

We need to decide whether to use Markdown or HTML for storing
[deliberation](https://www.annualreviews.org/doi/abs/10.1146/annurev.polisci.11.081306.070308) topics.

- **Markdown** files are a convenient way to include basic formatting in a human-readable plain text document that can be easily version controlled.
- **HTML** documents allow for more customization, but are more difficult to write and to read without a renderer.

_Are there any other reasons you can think of for choosing one or the other?_
